content.webTitle: CD Pop review: Antony and the Johnsons,  Another World EP

fields.headline: Pop review: Antony and the Johnsons,  Another World EP
fields.bodyText: To the ranks of eco warriors now add the looming figure of Antony Hegarty, last heard on I Am a Bird Now, OMM's album of the year in 2005, whose full sequel follows next year. That is, if the polar ice caps haven't melted by then and done for us all. If we are going to go, the magnificently mournful title track of this EP may as well be the soundtrack.
